values: 跟随；跟踪；追踪；追随；遵循；遵守；听从指令；履行；执行指令；遵照；遵奉；仿效；密切关注；理解；继续；随后发生；接踵而至；沿着前进；紧随其后；跟在…后面；排在…后面；按照（指示、规则）做；执行；密切注意；接着；沿着；理解；在…后发生；对…产生浓厚兴趣；发展

synonym.mean: 跟随；遵循；追求；密切注意

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。
原义为“追猎、猎取”，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。

word_group.brief_definition: 步某人后尘；走某人走过的路；继承事业
跟进；继续；对…采取进一步行动
按照说明 ；遵守指南 ；遵守指示
按照指令；跟随指令；服从指示

bilingual.source: Try to follow the beat of the music.
Why does Jim follow the pirates on the island?
bilingual.target: 为什么吉姆跟随岛上的海盗？

bilingual.source: Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow.
bilingual.target: 不要走在我前面，我可能不会跟随。

bilingual.source: Follow your curiosity and see where it takes you next!
bilingual.target: 跟随你的好奇心，看看它会带你去哪里！

bilingual.source: I like to follow the story and see what happens next.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢跟随剧情，看看接下来会发生什么。

bilingual.source: Orpheus tried to follow her, but no living man could enter the Underworld twice.
bilingual.target: 奥菲斯试图跟随她，但没有活人能两次进入冥界。

bilingual.source: He gestured for us to follow him.
bilingual.target: 他做手势示意我们跟随他。
无论哪里你去，我都会跟随。

bilingual.source: She asked him to follow her to the office.
bilingual.target: 她让他跟随她到办公室。

list.abstract: follow（英 [ˈfɒləʊ]，美 [ˈfɑːloʊ]），英语单词，动词，意思为跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面。短语搭配有follow suit（学样子），例句为“I'm afraid I didn't follow you.（恐怕我没有理解你的话）”。 follow及物动词类近义词有string along，不及物动词类近义词有string along、go on to，名词类近义词有me-tooism、sycophancy，相关反义词有precede、predate。follows是follow的第三人称单数。

yingyinNormal.en: Follow the scent of frankincense and herbs to the city's spice market.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟随乳香和草药的香气，就可以找到香料市场。

yingyinNormal.en: No more dark. No more hiding. No more caves. What's the point of all this? To follow the light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不再有黑暗, 不再躲藏, 不再躲在山洞里. 我们艰苦跋涉是为了什么呢? 跟随光明。

yingyinNormal.en: If you, dear father, do not take the trouble to check her, she'll be fixed forever as the silliest and most determined flirt who ever made her family ridiculous. And Kitty will follow, as she always does.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果爸爸你不制止她，她会被挂上愚蠢的卖俏者的花名，弄得我们全家都惹人笑话的。吉蒂也会一如既往地跟随着。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you think they'll follow me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得他们会追随我吗？

yingyinNormal.en: All right, just follow my lead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，跟着我的话锋转。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, follow it up in Greenland.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，跟着他到格陵兰岛。

yingyinNormal.en: We're ready for you now. Follow me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都准备好了，跟我来。

yingyinNormal.en: There's one last surprise. Follow me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有最后一个惊喜哦，跟我来！

yingyinNormal.en: I don't follow. Let me give you an example.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没听明白。我给你举个例子吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, why would we follow him into combat?
yingyinNormal.zh: 凭什么让我们跟着你去打仗？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, quick. We gotta find a cab and follow them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快，我们得拦辆的士跟踪他们。

yingyinNormal.en: So, why attempt the impossible? Why follow your dream?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那为何要挑战不可能？为何要追寻梦想？

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, start quacking and the ducklings will follow you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，快点学鸭子叫，这样小鸭子就会跟着你了。

yingyinNormal.en: Then why are your people still pulling hosts for follow-up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那为什么你的手下还在对接待员进行后续调查？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't expect you to follow me. I expect you to follow her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没指望你们跟我走，你们可以跟她走。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, everybody! Follow me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，各位！跟着我走！

yingyinNormal.en: If she wants to survive, she has to follow our rules.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是她想生存，必须守我们的规矩。

yingyinNormal.en: I require no rest, Lady Chabi. Lead and I will follow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不需要休整，察必皇后，现在可立刻与您前往。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, that's a good lead! You should follow that up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，这是一个很好的线索。你应该顺着这去找。

yingyinNormal.en: And Adman for Miss York. If you will, please, follow us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿达曼服侍约克小姐。如果您愿意，请随我们来。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 跟在...后面; 跟随; 追踪
追随; 效仿; 沿袭; 继承

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面；按照（指示；规则）做；执行；密切注意；从事；进行；跟踪；追随

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学样子；跟着做；跟牌；仿效
跟进；继续；对...采取进一步行动
按照指令；跟随指令；服从指示

sense_info_list.en: act according to an instruction or precepts

examination_example.sentence: On average, participants who <highlight>followed</highlight> this instruction felt better than those who had been told to stand or sit in silence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，比起那些被告知安静地站着或坐着的人，遵循这个指示的参与者感觉更好。

examination_example.sentence: A calm, rule-<highlight>following</highlight> child might respond better to a different sort of parenting than, for example, a younger sibling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个冷静、遵守规则的孩子可能会对不同类型的教育方式做出更好的反应，例如，与一个更小的兄弟姐妹相比。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have no hard scientific proof on the basis of the precautionary principle that it is advisable to <highlight>follow</highlight> the FSA advice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们没有确凿的科学证据来证明遵循FSA的建议是明智的。

sense_info_list.en: go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind
sense_info_list.zh: 跟在...后面; 跟随; 追踪

examination_example.sentence: During the experiment, the social robot rat <highlight>followed</highlight> the living rats around, and opened cage doors to let trapped rats escape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在实验过程中，社交机器鼠跟随活的老鼠四处走动，并打开笼子的门让被困的老鼠逃跑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Following</highlight> the explosion of creativity in Florence, the modern world saw a departure from what it had once known.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着佛罗伦萨创造力的爆发，现代世界看到了与它曾经所知相背离之处。

examination_example.sentence: More apparent reasonableness <highlight>followed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更明显的合理性随之而来。

sense_info_list.en: come after in time or order; happen after something else as a consequence

examination_example.sentence: However, the mechanisms proposed were unwieldy and the Bill was voted down <highlight>following</highlight> the change in government later that year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，提议的机制很难操作，该法案在当年晚些时候政府更迭后被否决。

examination_example.sentence: But it doesn't necessarily <highlight>follow</highlight> from findings like these that a world without work would be filled with unease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从这些发现中并不一定得出这样的结论：一个没有工作的世界会充满不安。

examination_example.sentence: As it was <highlight>following</highlight> the end of the Franco regime, monarchs can rise above "mere" politics and "embody" a spirit of national unity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着佛朗哥政权的结束，君主们可以超越“单纯的”政治，“体现”一种民族团结的精神。

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, only five of the 30 children paired with the "unreliable" tester participated in a <highlight>follow</highlight>-up activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，与“不可靠”测试者配对的30个孩子中，只有5个参加了后续活动。

sense_info_list.en: go along a route or path

examination_example.sentence: So, if you head downhill, and <highlight>follow</highlight> any H2O you find, you should eventually see signs of people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，如果你下山，沿着你找到的水前行，你最终会看到有人的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: We have a few tricks to help you navigate back to civilization, one of which is to <highlight>follow</highlight> the land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有一些技巧可以帮助你回到文明世界，其中之一就是沿着陆地前行。

examination_example.sentence: Unless a broad consensus can be reached on reforming the international tax system, other nations are likely to <highlight>follow</highlight> suit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非能就改革国际税收体系达成广泛共识，否则其他国家很可能会效仿。

sense_info_list.en: act according to the lead or example of someone
sense_info_list.zh: 追随; 效仿; 沿袭; 继承

sense_info_list.en: strive after; aim at
understand the meaning or tendency of a speaker or argument
practise (a trade or profession); undertake or carry out a course of action or study
pay close attention to something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 追随者；拥护者；爱好者；跟在后面的人

word_family.mean: v. 跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面；按照（指示；规则）做；执行；密切注意；从事；进行；跟踪；追随

sense_info_list.en: act according to an instruction or precepts

examination_example.sentence: Safe driving habits are practices which people know they should <highlight>follow</highlight> but often don't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安全驾驶习惯是人们知道他们应该遵守，但往往不遵守的习惯。

examination_example.sentence: They are reluctant to <highlight>follow</highlight> instructions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不愿意听从指示。

examination_example.sentence: They have not been trained to <highlight>follow</highlight> the rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们没有受过遵守规则的训练。

sense_info_list.en: come after in time or order; happen after something else as a consequence

examination_example.sentence: For example, years when people spent more time with friends were better years for wellbeing (and <highlight>followed</highlight> by better years).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，人们花更多时间与朋友相处的年份是健康状况较好的年份（随后是更好的年份）。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, years with larger increase in online usage were <highlight>followed</highlight> by years with lower wellbeing , rather than the other way around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，网络使用量的大幅增加的那些年份会伴随着接下来数年的幸福感的降低，反过来却不是如此。

examination_example.sentence: In a second analysis, they found that where technology went, dips in wellbeing <highlight>followed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第二次分析中，他们发现，随着科技的发展，幸福感也随之下降。

sense_info_list.en: pay close attention to something

examination_example.sentence: It's hard for these parents to <highlight>follow</highlight> their every move so that they never get hurt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些父母很难跟踪他们的一举一动，这样他们就不会受到伤害。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers would need to <highlight>follow</highlight> groups of children with and without music lessons over a long period of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员需要在很长一段时间内关注有音乐课和没有音乐课的孩子们。

examination_example.sentence: The neuroscientist Peter Schneider from Heidelberg University in Germany, for example, has been <highlight>following</highlight> a group of children for ten years now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，德国海德堡大学的神经科学家彼得·施耐德已经跟踪一组儿童十年了。

sense_info_list.en: go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind

examination_example.sentence: When young Mary Sawyer was <highlight>followed</highlight> to school by a lamb in 1816, it caused some problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1816年，有只羊羔跟着小 Mary Sawyer 上学，这引起了一些问题。

sense_info_list.en: understand the meaning or tendency of a speaker or argument

examination_example.sentence: They can't <highlight>follow</highlight> the conflicts in the show.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们看不懂剧中的冲突。

sense_info_list.en: act according to the lead or example of someone

examination_example.sentence: They take pop stars as their idols, <highlight>following</highlight> their style of dressing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们以流行歌星为偶像，追随他们的穿着风格。

examination_example.sentence: In an earlier time, American fashion had also <highlight>followed</highlight> the dictates of Paris, or even copied and pirated specific French designs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在更早的时候，美国时装也遵循巴黎的影响，甚至复制和盗版特定的法国设计。

sense_info_list.en: undertake or carry out a course of action or study

examination_example.sentence: Managers usually love people who are strong at <highlight>following</highlight> through their work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经理通常喜欢那些在工作中坚持不懈的人。

sense_info_list.en: strive after; aim at
go along a route or path

examination_example.sentence: Birds <highlight>following</highlight> traditional migration routes were more likely to die.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遵循传统迁徙路线的鸟类更容易死亡。

word_usage.usage: follow可表示“跟在…之后”，常作及物动词，后面不需要再加介词after或behind。
as follows属于固定的习惯用语，在以词组形式出现的时候，follow不可以单数形式出现，不管句子主语是单数或复数，都用as follows。

follow后不可接动词不定式的结构，如：
误 I followed him to go into the house.
正 I followed him into the house.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指快速追赶或决心追踪, 褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词, 含义最广, 多指跟在他人后面走路、驾车等, 也可指追随某人从事某项事业, 动机可以是善意的, 也可能是恶意的。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学样子；跟别人出同样花色的牌
跟进；继续；对...采取进一步行动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面；按照（指示；规则）做；执行；密切注意；从事；进行；跟踪；追随

sense_info_list.en: act according to an instruction or precepts

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Follow</highlight> their intuition in deciding what to eat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听从他们的直觉来决定吃什么。

examination_example.sentence: They must <highlight>follow</highlight> some common standards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们必须遵循一些共识。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>follow</highlight> traffic rules closely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们严格遵守交通规则。

sense_info_list.en: go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind

examination_example.sentence: A 2018 study published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, for example, <highlight>followed</highlight> researchers in the Netherlands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，发表在《美国国家科学院院刊》上的一项2018年的研究跟踪了荷兰的研究人员。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>following</highlight> individuals over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过长期跟踪人们。

examination_example.sentence: The study, which <highlight>followed</highlight> more than 2, 000 healthy adults between the ages of 18 and 60.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究追踪了2000多名年龄在18岁到60岁之间的健康成年人。

sense_info_list.en: come after in time or order; happen after something else as a consequence

examination_example.sentence: Among common kitchen appliances used for cooking, microwaves are the most energy efficient, <highlight>followed</highlight> by a stove and finally a standard oven.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在所有常见的厨房烹饪用具中，微波炉是最节能的，其次是厨灶，最后是标准烤箱。

examination_example.sentence: The nutritional and health crises that <highlight>followed</highlight> the policy of structural adjustment, he says, led to many children and teenagers failing to reach their full potential in terms of height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，结构调整政策之后的营养和健康危机，导致许多儿童和青少年在身高方面未能充分发挥潜力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Following</highlight> this disaster, the Britannic hit a naval mine in 1916 and subsequently sank as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在此次灾难后，不列颠尼克号于1916年撞到一枚水雷，随后也沉没了。

examination_example.sentence: The Olympic launched first in 1910, <highlight>followed</highlight> by the Titanic in 1911, and lastly the Britannic in 1914.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥林匹克号于1910年首先下水航行，紧随其后的是1911年泰坦尼克号，最后是1914年的不列颠尼克号。

sense_info_list.en: act according to the lead or example of someone

examination_example.sentence: It has led some other companies to <highlight>follow</highlight> suit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它已经导致其他一些公司的效仿。

examination_example.sentence: The city of Bogor <highlight>followed</highlight> suit in 2018.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茂物市在2018年也紧随其后。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Follow</highlight> his example.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以他为榜样。

sense_info_list.en: go along a route or path

examination_example.sentence: "I <highlight>followed</highlight> my route like I normally do," Smith told a reporter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史密斯告诉记者：“我像往常一样沿着我的路线走。”

sense_info_list.en: strive after; aim at
undertake or carry out a course of action or study
understand the meaning or tendency of a speaker or argument

word_usage.usage: as follows属于固定的习惯用语，在以词组形式出现的时候，follow不可以单数形式出现，不管句子主语是单数或复数，都用as follows。

follow后不可接动词不定式的结构，如：
误 I followed him to go into the house.
正 I followed him into the house.
follow可表示“跟在…之后”，常作及物动词，后面不需要再加介词after或behind。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟在他人后面走路、驾车等，也可指追随某人从事某项事业，动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面；按照（指示；规则）做；执行；密切注意；从事；进行；跟踪；追随

sense_info_list.en: come after in time or order; happen after something else as a consequence

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, it took the explorers and the settlers who <highlight>followed</highlight> only a few decades to decimate a large part of these resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，仅仅几十年后，探险家和定居者就毁灭了这些资源的很大一部分。

examination_example.sentence: An imaginary world will disassociate itself more and more from the procedure that <highlight>follows</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个想象的世界将会越来越脱离接下来的过程。

examination_example.sentence: Language researchers say pronunciation and fluency are the biggest barriers, <highlight>followed</highlight> by grammar in effective spoken English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言研究人员表示，发音和流利程度才有效练习英语口语的最大障碍，其次才是语法。

examination_example.sentence: As part of the package, initial and <highlight>follow-up</highlight> training sessions are provided and accommodation is available if required.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一揽子计划的一部分，我们将会提供初始和后续培训课程，并在需要时提供住宿。

sense_info_list.en: act according to an instruction or precepts

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Following</highlight> the planned time will ensure you have enough sleep to get to those early classes and stay wide awake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遵循计划好的时间将确保你有足够的睡眠去上早课并保持完全清醒。

examination_example.sentence: The exhibition <highlight>follows</highlight> a path of time and subject with the visitor exiting through the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 展览按照时间和主题布展的，参观者则经由“大脑”退出展厅。

sense_info_list.en: go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind

examination_example.sentence: The last few years have been exciting because I've been <highlight>following</highlight> my heart to do what I love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去的几年很令人兴奋，因为我一直在跟随自己的心去做我喜欢的事情。

examination_example.sentence: She has the courage to <highlight>follow</highlight> her heart and do what's he really likes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她有勇气跟随自己的内心，做他真正喜欢的事情。

examination_example.sentence: It was not until I <highlight>followed</highlight> this feeling to its source that I discovered I had a passion for writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到我跟随这种感觉找到了它的源头，我才发现我对写作有了热情。

sense_info_list.en: undertake or carry out a course of action or study
strive after; aim at

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟在他人后面走路、驾车等，也可指追随某人从事某项事业，动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 跟在...后面; 跟随; 追踪
追随; 效仿; 步...的后尘

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 步某人后尘；走某人走过的路；继承事业
按照说明 ；遵守指南 ；遵守指示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 追随者；拥护者；爱好者；跟在后面的人

word_family.mean: v. 跟在…后面；跟随；排在…后面；按照（指示；规则）做；执行；密切注意；从事；进行；跟踪；追随

sense_info_list.en: act according to an instruction or precepts

examination_example.sentence: We'd better <highlight>follow</highlight> the seven-step hand-washing method to keep healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了保持健康，我们最好遵循七步洗手法。

examination_example.sentence: They usually <highlight>follow</highlight> the same ways every year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通常每年都遵循同样的方式。

examination_example.sentence: All students in the UK now have to <highlight>follow</highlight> strict bullying policies (政策).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在所有的英国学生都必须遵守严格的欺凌政策。

sense_info_list.en: go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind
sense_info_list.zh: 跟在...后面; 跟随; 追踪

examination_example.sentence: His cousins, Ted and Kate, have to <highlight>follow</highlight> clues (线索) around London and find him before it is too late.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的堂兄弟姐妹，泰德和凯特，不得不在伦敦跟着线索四处寻，但找到他们时为时已晚。

examination_example.sentence: He nodded and asked me to <highlight>follow</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他点头，让我跟上。

examination_example.sentence: I tried to run slowly so that she could <highlight>follow</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我试图跑慢一点，这样他能跟上我。

sense_info_list.en: come after in time or order; happen after something else as a consequence

examination_example.sentence: Here are a few opinions we often get from kids, <highlight>followed</highlight> by ideas that might help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我们经常从孩子们那里得到的一些意见，然后是一些可能有用的想法。

examination_example.sentence: Players play a round of chess, <highlight>followed</highlight> by a round of boxing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玩家先下一盘棋，接着是一轮拳击。

examination_example.sentence: In Germany, your interview might begin with a very short conversation <highlight>followed</highlight> by a formal (正式的) interview.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在德国，你的面试可能从一个非常简短的谈话开始，然后是一个正式的面试。

sense_info_list.en: act according to the lead or example of someone
sense_info_list.zh: 追随; 效仿; 步...的后尘

examination_example.sentence: When your friends do something stupid, you don't have to <highlight>follow</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你朋友做傻事的时候，你不要效仿。

examination_example.sentence: So when Shang Yang began carrying out his reforms, the people <highlight>followed</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当商鞅开始实行变法时，人民都追随他。

examination_example.sentence: If a celebrity drinks and smokes, his fans will <highlight>follow</highlight> him because they look up to the celebrity so much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一个名人喝酒抽烟，他的粉丝会效仿他，因为他们非常崇拜这个名人。

sense_info_list.en: strive after; aim at

examination_example.sentence: Who encouraged Darrius to <highlight>follow</highlight> his dream?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是谁鼓励 Darrius 追求自己的梦想？

examination_example.sentence: Dreams are like stars. You may never catch them, but if you <highlight>follow</highlight> them, they will lead you to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦想就像星辰，你可能永远都抓不住它们，但是如果你追求它们（梦想），它们将带领你走向成功。

examination_example.sentence: Yan achieved her dream because she had the courage to <highlight>follow</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 严实现了她的梦想，因为她有勇气去追求

sense_info_list.en: go along a route or path

examination_example.sentence: The novel <highlight>follows</highlight> the lives of four sisters—Meg, Jo, Beth, and Amy March from childhood to womanhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这本书讲述了四姐妹——梅格、乔、贝丝和艾米的从小到大的生活。

examination_example.sentence: The trip <highlight>followed</highlight> the way of Xiaopingzhai→ Kangmian→ Shuiduichong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次旅行是沿着小平寨→ 康棉→ 水堆冲的路线进行的。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>followed</highlight> his teacher's map, but he made one little mistake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他按照老师的地图走，但犯了一个小错误。

sense_info_list.en: understand the meaning or tendency of a speaker or argument

examination_example.sentence: Don't send long voice messages because it's hard to <highlight>follow</highlight> and remember.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要发很长的语音信息，因为很难理解和记住。

examination_example.sentence: I'm afraid I didn't <highlight>follow</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 恐怕我没有理解你的话。

word_usage.usage: follow可表示“跟在…之后”，常作及物动词，后面不需要再加介词after或behind。
as follows属于固定的习惯用语，在以词组形式出现的时候，follow不可以单数形式出现，不管句子主语是单数或复数，都用as follows。

follow后不可接动词不定式的结构，如：
误 I followed him to go into the house.
正 I followed him into the house.
